metadata.title: CVE-2016-5099 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in phpMyAdmin 4.4.x before4.4.15.6 and 4.6.x before 4.6.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via special characters that are mishandled during doubleURL decoding.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
